Took in @tso Messiah at R. Thomson Hall with son last night. Wonderful. Beautiful start to festive season. Take the family. #hallelujah
@miketherien call for the resignation of Environment minister ...
@michellepennell thanks Michelle. appreciate the kind words
@grahamctv Thanks, Graham. Sad yes, but time to let the younger folk take over as well.
@TonyclementCPC Thanks for this, Tony. Will be sure you're invited to the "mugging". Gonna miss all of you. Cheers
It must be Recovering Journalist night @tso Messiah. Hallelujah! https://t.co/KaL2tq5qVD
Thanks, Martin - No more QPark mom and pop arguing about the kids in the gallery. Always appreciate your comments. https://t.co/Uf8XQSEYf2
1st day of retirement: Sleep late. Buy Christmas crackers. Visit LCBO. Go to Messiah @tso with my son. Stay up late. All good.
Special thanks to Sun desk and to my good friends in the Legislative Press Gallery. You guys are amazing and made my last day the best.
Thanks, everyone. Friday was a tough day but made so much lighter with all the good wishes from friends and colleagues. 1/2
